faqs.question: Is DevOps with AWS in demand in 2025?
faqs.answer: Yes, DevOps with AWS is highly in demand in 2025 as businesses increasingly adopt AWS for scalable and efficient cloud solutions. AWS tools like CodePipeline and Lambda streamline automation, making DevOps expertise essential for faster deployments and innovation.

faqs.question: What are the roles and responsibilities for DevOps with AWS?
faqs.answer: DevOps professionals manage scalable AWS infrastructure, automate CI/CD pipelines, and ensure security and compliance using AWS tools like CloudFormation, CodePipeline, and IAM. They monitor performance with CloudWatch, optimize workflows, and deploy containerized applications with ECS and EKS. This course prepares you to excel in these essential DevOps roles.

faqs.question: What is the average salary for professionals in DevOps with AWS?
faqs.answer: The average salary for DevOps professionals with AWS skills in India varies by experience Entry-Level: ₹5-8 LPA, Mid-Level: ₹8-15 LPA, Top-Level: ₹15-30 LPA or more, depending on expertise and company size.These figures can fluctuate based on location and industry demand.

faqs.question: How does learning the fundamentals at Coursevita set you up for success?
faqs.answer: At Coursevita, mastering the basics is essential for long-term success in DevOps with AWS. Our structured approach ensures you build a strong foundation, avoid learning gaps, and understand critical concepts like cloud architecture and CI/CD pipelines. This not only boosts confidence but also makes you job-ready for real-world challenges.

faqs.question: What type of learning experience can I expect?
faqs.answer: In our course, you can expect a hands-on, interactive learning experience with real-world applications. You'll engage in practical exercises, live discussions, and project-based learning that will help you build a strong understanding of key concepts. Our expert instructors will guide you through each step, ensuring a comprehensive and enriching experience.

faqs.question: What is the EMI payment process?
faqs.answer: At Coursevita, you can pay for courses in easy EMIs. Select the course, choose the EMI option at checkout, pick your preferred bank, and complete the payment. Monthly installments will be automatically deducted based on your chosen tenure. For details, contact our support team - support@coursevita.com

faqs.question: What are the profiles of the tutors?
faqs.answer: Our tutors at Coursevita are experienced professionals with advanced degrees and certifications in fields like Data Science, Data Analytics, DevOps, and Cloud Computing (AWS and Azure). They bring years of hands-on industry experience and are skilled educators committed to student success. With expertise in cutting-edge technologies, they provide practical, real-world insights to help learners achieve their goals.

faqs.question: How will my doubts get solved?
faqs.answer: Your doubts will be addressed through interactive Q&A sessions, discussion forums, and live chat support. You can also email our support team (support@coursevita.com) for personalized assistance, or connect with instructors during scheduled office hours for one-on-one help.

faqs.question: What is the refund policy at Coursevita?
faqs.answer: Refunds are allowed before the batch commencement with a 50% processing fee on the initial payment. No refunds are permitted after the batch begins. For more details check out the refund policy.

courseDesc: In this comprehensive data science course, you'll learn how to extract meaningful insights from complex data sets. From data wrangling to building predictive models, this course covers the entire data science pipeline.

mentors.name: Neha Gupta
mentors.tagLine: IIT Madras, Ex-JPMC (10+ years exp in leading MNC'S)

mentors.tagLine: Sr. Data Scientist (6+ years exp in leading MNC'S)

description: Understand foundational statistical concepts and data types (qualitative and quantitative).
Learn measures of central tendency (mean, median, mode) and dispersion (variance, standard deviation).
Explore probability distributions, including Normal, Binomial, and Poisson distributions.

modules.moduleHeading: Mastering Microsoft Excel for Data Analysis
description: Develop skills in statistical analysis, data cleaning, and preparation using Excel.
Utilize advanced Excel features like Pivot Tables, Pivot Charts, and lookup functions.
Learn basic Excel macros and formulas to automate data tasks.
Gain proficiency in Python programming fundamentals, including data types, variables, and control structures.
Work with Python libraries like NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, and Seaborn for data manipulation and visualization.
Learn advanced string handling, exception handling, and Jupyter Notebook usage.

modules.moduleHeading: SQL for Data Querying and Management
description: Master SQL fundamentals, including basic queries, data aggregation, and joins.
Explore subqueries, nested queries, and advanced SQL techniques.
Understand relational databases and data manipulation practices.
Learn to create interactive dashboards and visualizations using Power BI.
Understand Power BI building blocks, data connections, and formatting techniques.
Master advanced visualization techniques and publish reports.
Handle large datasets efficiently and perform feature engineering.
Learn feature scaling, normalization, and handling categorical variables.
Work with distributed computing frameworks like Dask and Spark.
Master advanced visualization techniques, including geo-spatial visualization.
Apply statistical modeling, outlier detection, and dimensionality reduction (PCA, T-SNE, UMAP).
Create interactive plots with Plotly and Bokeh.
Understand linear and logistic regression models.
Learn hypothesis testing techniques, including t-tests, chi-square tests, and ANOVA.
Apply residual analysis and model diagnostics.
Explore supervised learning techniques such as logistic regression, decision trees, and SVMs.
Learn to evaluate models using metrics like ROC curves and precision-recall curves.
Handle class imbalance and apply Naive Bayes classification.
Master ensemble methods like bagging and boosting.
Learn advanced regression techniques, including Ridge and Lasso regression.
Understand deep learning architectures like CNNs and RNNs.
Learn clustering techniques like DBSCAN, OPTICS, and hierarchical clustering.
Apply dimensionality reduction techniques like PCA and association rule mining.
Evaluate clustering models effectively.

modules.moduleHeading: Advanced Model Evaluation and Hyperparameter Tuning
description: Learn automated hyperparameter tuning methods (Grid Search, Random Search, Bayesian Optimization).
Understand advanced cross-validation techniques and performance metrics.
Optimize model performance for real-world applications.
Explore deep learning models such as CNNs, RNNs, and Transformers.
Learn about Generative AI, language models (LLMs), and Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG).
Apply deep learning in computer vision and NLP tasks.

modules.moduleHeading: Working with Image and Video Data
description: Master image preprocessing, classification, and object detection.
Learn video processing techniques and apply CNNs to video data.
Deploy image and video models for scalable applications.
Learn sentiment analysis, named entity recognition, and text classification.
Explore advanced NLP methods using RNNs, Transformers, and BERT models.
Apply text preprocessing and analysis for real-world use cases.
Complete an end-to-end data science project applying all learned skills.
Develop your professional portfolio with real-world projects.
Receive guidance on resume building, interview preparation, and career growth.

courseDesc: Our Digital Marketing Course with AI, designed to meet industry demands, helps you kickstart a successful career in digital marketing. Master AI-driven marketing tools, strategies, and analytics with hands-on real-world projects. Earn certifications and gain the skills needed to excel in top digital marketing roles powered by AI.

description: What is Marketing? Understanding its core principles and importance.

Types of Online Businesses (E-commerce, Service-Based, Subscription, SaaS, etc.).
Leads vs. Sales – Key differences and their impact on business growth.
Branding, Marketing, Advertising, Promotions, and Sales – Definitions and roles.
Market Segmentation, Targeting, and Positioning (STP) – Creating a winning strategy.

faqs.question: What is the eligibility criteria to learn Digital Marketing?
faqs.answer: Digital Marketing is open to anyone interested in business and marketing, regardless of educational background. The skills are highly in-demand and provide great career opportunities.

faqs.question: How do I know if the course is right for me?
faqs.answer: If you're interested in learning how AI can enhance your digital marketing skills, this course is perfect for you. It's designed to be easy to understand and practical for real-world use.

faqs.question: What is the average salary for professionals in Digital Marketing?
faqs.answer: The average salary for Digital Marketing professionals in India varies by experience: Entry-Level: ₹3-6 LPA, Mid-Level: ₹6-12 LPA, Top-Level: ₹12-25 LPA or more, depending on expertise, specialization, and company size. These figures can fluctuate based on location, industry demand, and skill set (SEO, PPC, content marketing, analytics, etc.)

faqs.question: Will I receive a certificate upon completion of the course?
faqs.answer: In our course, you can expect a hands-on, interactive learning experience with real-world applications. You'll engage in practical exercises, live discussions, and project-based learning that will help you build a strong understanding of key concepts. Our expert instructors will guide you through each step, ensuring a comprehensive and enriching experience.

faqs.question: What if I can’t understand some topics and want to get training for those?
faqs.answer: Yes, upon completing the course, you'll receive a certificate from Coursevita, validating your digital marketing skills and expertise.

faqs.question: What happens if I can’t attend the live Session?
faqs.answer: We offer clarification sessions upon request, and you can retake the entire course at no extra cost if needed.

faqs.question: How will my doubts get solved?
faqs.answer: Your doubt will be addressed through interactive Q&A sessions, Discussion forums, and live chat support. You can also email our support team (support@coursevita.com) for personalized assistance, or connect with instructors during scheduled office hours for one-on-one help.

faqs.question: What is the refund policy at Coursevita?
faqs.answer: Refunds are allowed before the batch commencement with a 50 % processing fee on the initial payment. No refunds are permitted after the batch begins. For more details check out the refund policy.

faqs.question: How involved is the mentor in this program?
faqs.answer: Our mentor will be actively involved in live sessions, answering questions and providing feedback. While responses outside of sessions may be limited, the mentor will frequently share insights and address common concerns.

faqs.question: Can we see growth in Digital Marketing career?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Staying updated with evolving trends creates clear opportunities for career growth. You can continually upgrade your skills and move up to higher roles.

faqs.question: Is the AI Engineer Course in demand in 2025?
faqs.answer: Yes, AI engineering is in high demand in 2025 as businesses adopt data-driven strategies. From automation to intelligent systems, industries need AI engineers to design, develop, and deploy smart solutions that improve efficiency and decision-making.

faqs.question: What are the roles and responsibilities for an AI Engineer?
faqs.answer: AI engineers collect and clean large datasets, build algorithms for learning and decision-making, and deploy AI applications. They work with tools like Python, TensorFlow, and cloud services to create real-world solutions such as recommendation engines, chat systems, and predictive models. This course prepares you for these in-demand roles.

faqs.question: What is the average salary for professionals in AI Engineer?
faqs.answer: The average salary for AI Engineers in India depends on experience: Entry-Level: ₹6–10 LPA, Mid-Level: ₹10–18 LPA, Senior-Level: ₹18–35 LPA or more, based on skills and industry. These ranges can vary depending on company size, location, and project scale.

faqs.question: How does learning the fundamentals at Coursevita set you up for success?
faqs.answer: At Coursevita, the AI Engineer course begins with core skills like Python, data handling, and logic building. This solid foundation helps you avoid gaps in learning and makes it easier to master more complex topics like deep learning and deployment. With hands-on support, you’ll be prepared for real AI roles in tech industries.

faqs.question: What type of learning experience can I expect?
faqs.answer: You’ll experience an engaging and practical journey. The course includes live sessions, hands-on labs, projects using real datasets, and step-by-step guidance. You’ll learn how to solve real problems using AI tools and techniques that are in demand across industries today.

faqs.question: What is the EMI payment process?
faqs.answer: At Coursevita, you can pay for courses in easy EMIs. Select the course, choose the EMI option at checkout, pick your preferred bank, and complete the payment. Monthly installments will be automatically deducted based on your chosen tenure. For details, contact our support team - support@coursevita.com

faqs.question: What are the profiles of the tutors?
faqs.answer: Coursevita’s AI instructors are seasoned professionals with deep knowledge in Python, data science, deep learning, and cloud deployment. They have worked in leading tech companies and are passionate educators, combining real-world AI experience with clear, beginner-friendly teaching.

faqs.question: How will my doubts get solved?
faqs.answer: Your doubts will be addressed through interactive Q&A sessions, discussion forums, and live chat support. You can also email our support team (support@coursevita.com) for personalized assistance, or connect with instructors during scheduled office hours for one-on-one help.

faqs.answer: Refunds are allowed before the batch commencement with a 50% processing fee on the initial payment. No refunds are permitted after the batch begins. For more details check out the refund policy.
